title: Phantom Phoenix
summaries: The Phantom Phoenix is a Hardmode bow dropped by the Ogre mini-boss during the Old One's Army event. It fires two arrows at a time, spreading randomly similarly to the Chlorophyte Shotbow, and also fires a large phoenix with a waving arc every third / fourth shot. The phoenix deals double the weapon's damage, and explodes when colliding with a wall. It also converts regular Wooden Arrows into Flaming Arrows, similar to the Molten Fury.
